response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would also greatly benefit you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its original value, making it a fantastic deal for you. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, so this offer aims to bridge the gap while ensuring both parties are satisfied. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1350000}
